creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract surreal image; salmon-colored lozenge-shape with wavy edges and purple triangular protrusions, with geometric diagram over form with letters and lines; blue "sky" with yellow at horizon line and blue ground; painterly blue, purple, and salmon-colored brushstrokes at top; text at top in pencil: "[illegible] in a small meeting / [illegible] tion of human in the [illegible]"
medium: Watercolor and colored pencil (?) on paper
title: Untitled
